edge_1: Sharon brings the Manson recording to Steven, who is knowledgeable about technology, and he determines that it contains subliminal messages when played in reverse.
edge_2: Steven attempts to use a CB radio to call for help as Tex tracks the group.
edge_3: Tex breaches the camper, but Steven beats him with a shovel before Sharon shoots him to death.
